pr_title: [no ticket][risk=no] Puppeteer Simplify openSubtab function in Data page

timeline.bodyText: The default timeout for waitForFunction is 10 seconds. It is too short and made tests flaky. Increase it to 30 seconds helps to reduce flaky.
timeline.author: aweng98

replies.bodyText: If you think individual steps are too slow, please file tickets on those, especially if it's a regression.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: throw (err) to keep original stacktrace unchanged. It was a mistake to do throw new Error() before.
timeline.author: aweng98

replies.bodyText: you might be able to set the stack trace to the original stack trace if you need to.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: Could you also use await here?
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: return makes await redundant. same outcome with or without it.
replies.author: aweng98
